Html:
Hello,
I have currently started having an issue with WPP. I go to create a Package and when I click on Publish I get "CreateDirectory failed" I am not sure what is going on. I have looked up online and do not see anything related to this issue except permissions to the temp folder which I have. It was working last week, but believe maybe some folders were deleted. WSUS is working fine. Any help would be appreciated.

WPP Release: 1.3.1411.9
